GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of article requested by ID

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of article comments requested by article ID, sorted by most recent first

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment for an article and responds to client with the added comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates a given article's votes by the value provided by newVote in the passed object {inc_votes: newVote}

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles?topic.description: serves an array of articles filtered by topic
